Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I'm Sam. Good to meet you. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I'm Sam. Good to meet you.

Entries.DialogueText: Aw yeah... Pizza time! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aw yeah... Pizza time!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, hey, hey! You remembered! Now that's what I'm talking about! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, hey, hey! You remembered! Now that's what I'm talking about!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, hey, hey! You rememb-- {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, hey, hey! You rememb--

Entries.DialogueText: ...*sniff*...*sniff*... what's that gnarly smell...? {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...*sniff*...*sniff*... what's that gnarly smell...?

Entries.DialogueText: ...Oh. {Portrait:Angry}
Oh... with me? Hehe... Yeah, sure. Sounds fun! {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... with me? Hehe... Yeah, sure. Sounds fun!

Entries.DialogueText: Whaa! Is it acid? Will it burn through the roof and sizzle us alive? {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whaa! Is it acid? Will it burn through the roof and sizzle us alive?

Entries.DialogueText: I gotta keep my little brother safe! {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I gotta keep my little brother safe!

Entries.DialogueText: Seems like there's no damage to anything... That was a strange one. How are you holding up?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Seems like there's no damage to anything... That was a strange one. How are you holding up?

Entries.DialogueText: You notice how warm this rain is? It feels alive...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You notice how warm this rain is? It feels alive...

Entries.DialogueText: Um... So, can I get a kiss now? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... So, can I get a kiss now?

Entries.DialogueText: I couldn't sleep last night. I was imagining all the things we're gonna do together. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I couldn't sleep last night. I was imagining all the things we're gonna do together.

Entries.DialogueText: Whoaa... Hold on... this is for me? I never expected this! Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoaa... Hold on... this is for me? I never expected this! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: I heard you and Sebastian are going out... he better still be coming to band practice every week!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard you and Sebastian are going out... he better still be coming to band practice every week!

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, I can't believe you and Sebastian got hitched. Times really are changing... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, I can't believe you and Sebastian got hitched. Times really are changing...

Entries.DialogueText: Eh, it's alright, I'm sure he'll still have time to hang out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Eh, it's alright, I'm sure he'll still have time to hang out.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, what's the big idea? You took my drummer! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, what's the big idea? You took my drummer!

Entries.DialogueText: Haha, just kidding... Congrats! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha, just kidding... Congrats!

Entries.DialogueText: I better lay low for a while. I wouldn't want to get on Mayor Lewis' bad side!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I better lay low for a while. I wouldn't want to get on Mayor Lewis' bad side!

Entries.DialogueText: Heheh... So you've been to the sewer, huh? I've snuck down there a few times myself. It's pretty creepy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heheh... So you've been to the sewer, huh? I've snuck down there a few times myself. It's pretty creepy.

Entries.DialogueText: How could I tell? Hmm... let's just say... 'the nose knows'. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How could I tell? Hmm... let's just say... 'the nose knows'.

Entries.DialogueText: Wouldn't it be cool if the town had a skate park, though?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wouldn't it be cool if the town had a skate park, though?

Entries.DialogueText: Now, how to convince Mayor Lewis... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, how to convince Mayor Lewis...

Entries.DialogueText: Even with all the practice we did, I made a bunch of mistakes on stage... I hope no one noticed. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even with all the practice we did, I made a bunch of mistakes on stage... I hope no one noticed.

Entries.DialogueText: It's kind of nerve-wracking to be in front of everyone! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kind of nerve-wracking to be in front of everyone!

Entries.DialogueText: If... I mean when... my Dad gets back, I wonder if he'll be the same as I remember him? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If... I mean when... my Dad gets back, I wonder if he'll be the same as I remember him?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, what a spot!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, what a spot!

Entries.DialogueText: I bet there's some cool stuff deeper on the island.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I bet there's some cool stuff deeper on the island.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy said we have to stay here, though... some kind of liability issues or something. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy said we have to stay here, though... some kind of liability issues or something.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm feeling pretty good from all the sunlight. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm feeling pretty good from all the sunlight.

Entries.DialogueText: Check out these gnarly waves... Guess what? I'm gonna save up for a surfboard.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Check out these gnarly waves... Guess what? I'm gonna save up for a surfboard.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam is playing a jazzy tune on his guitar.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam is playing a jazzy tune on his guitar.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I should learn to play the ukulele.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I should learn to play the ukulele.

Entries.DialogueText: Abby on the congas and Sebastian on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Abby on the congas and Sebastian on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...

Entries.DialogueText: What's the matter, you look worried. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's the matter, you look worried.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just getting juiced up, then it's back to the beach.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just getting juiced up, then it's back to the beach.

Entries.DialogueText: Aw, I gotta put on that dorky suit again? I thought now that we're married... Well, alright. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aw, I gotta put on that dorky suit again? I thought now that we're married... Well, alright.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I dunno. Maybe next year. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I dunno. Maybe next year.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Angry}
Alright, I'm done with the cold shoulder act. Let's just forget about what happened. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright, I'm done with the cold shoulder act. Let's just forget about what happened.

Entries.DialogueText: Wait... what?! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wait... what?!

Entries.DialogueText: I thought we were doing okay... I guess I was way off... alright, then. {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought we were doing okay... I guess I was way off... alright, then.

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah, sure... we can still be friends. {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah, sure... we can still be friends.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry, {Farmer_Name}. I don't think I can still be your friend. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry, . I don't think I can still be your friend.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, how's it going?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, how's it going?

Entries.DialogueText: Last night I practiced guitar for 4 hours straight. My fingers hurt like crazy. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Last night I practiced guitar for 4 hours straight. My fingers hurt like crazy.

Entries.DialogueText: Bye, I've got something to do...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bye, I've got something to do...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, farmer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, farmer.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samson'. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samson'.

Entries.DialogueText: Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.

Entries.DialogueText: Take it easy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Take it easy.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Do you want to hang out or something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Do you want to hang out or something?

Entries.DialogueText: Sleeping feels nice but sometimes I wish I could skip it... it's just such a time-waster.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sleeping feels nice but sometimes I wish I could skip it... it's just such a time-waster.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey.. What do you think my new song should be about?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey.. What do you think my new song should be about?

Entries.DialogueText: Farming, mining, and chopping wood.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farming, mining, and chopping wood.

Entries.DialogueText: A city in the sea.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A city in the sea.

Entries.DialogueText: Trains.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Trains.

Entries.DialogueText: Choose anything. It'll still be a horrible song.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Choose anything. It'll still be a horrible song.

Entries.DialogueText: But I already know what you think about it. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I already know what you think about it.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks to your help I'm already done with the lyrics! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks to your help I'm already done with the lyrics!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, man... what the heck is your problem? Sorry I asked. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, man... what the heck is your problem? Sorry I asked.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you know what? That sounds perfect. Thanks! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you know what? That sounds perfect. Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: I've been friends with Sebastian for a while. He's a pretty cool guy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been friends with Sebastian for a while. He's a pretty cool guy.

Entries.DialogueText: If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}. Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: . Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.

Entries.DialogueText: I think my Dad might be coming back in a year or so.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think my Dad might be coming back in a year or so.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess you might be able to meet him, then. If you're still living here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess you might be able to meet him, then. If you're still living here.

Entries.DialogueText: You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!

Entries.DialogueText: ...I have mixed feelings about my father being back. He seems strange. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I have mixed feelings about my father being back. He seems strange.

Entries.DialogueText: But I guess I haven't seen him in 3 years... so that could explain it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I guess I haven't seen him in 3 years... so that could explain it.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... what am I still doing here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... what am I still doing here?

Entries.DialogueText: The clouds look great this time of year, don't they?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The clouds look great this time of year, don't they?

Entries.DialogueText: Like scoops of vanilla ice cream floating on blue raspberry sauce... Or maybe I'm just hungry.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Like scoops of vanilla ice cream floating on blue raspberry sauce... Or maybe I'm just hungry.

Entries.DialogueText: My Dad is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My Dad is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here...

Entries.DialogueText: He'll come back someday.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He'll come back someday.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just glad he's okay.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just glad he's okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, my Dad is back. Have you met him?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just glad he's okay.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just glad he's okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Did I ever tell you we used to live in the city?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did I ever tell you we used to live in the city?

Entries.DialogueText: There's a lot more stuff going on, but it's also kinda noisy and hectic... It's hard to say which is better.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's a lot more stuff going on, but it's also kinda noisy and hectic... It's hard to say which is better.

Entries.DialogueText: Dad used to work as a garbage man in the city.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad used to work as a garbage man in the city.

Entries.DialogueText: You don't even want to know some of the things he found in people's trash.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You don't even want to know some of the things he found in people's trash.

Entries.DialogueText: The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.

Entries.DialogueText: Although I could be biased... for a certain reason. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.

Entries.DialogueText: So, how are you doing today? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, how are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my Grandma. Okay, I'm going to put this rubber band on my wrist so I don't forget.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my Grandma. Okay, I'm going to put this rubber band on my wrist so I don't forget.

Entries.DialogueText: I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm. I just remembered that I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm. I just remembered that I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.

Entries.DialogueText: This happens to me all the time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This happens to me all the time.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I wonder if my mother is actually happy with her life... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes I wonder if my mother is actually happy with her life...

Entries.DialogueText: I asked her once and got the feeling she was hiding some inner pain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I asked her once and got the feeling she was hiding some inner pain.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, it's a nice day... isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, it's a nice day... isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Did you watch the game last night?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you watch the game last night?

Entries.DialogueText: Or wait, do you even have a TV set...?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or wait, do you even have a TV set...?

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh, I stepped in something gross earlier... and I just bought these shoes. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh, I stepped in something gross earlier... and I just bought these shoes.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes those spring petals that float around make my nose drip. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes those spring petals that float around make my nose drip.

Entries.DialogueText: I like summer best, myself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like summer best, myself.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you know what? That's exactly the kind of style I've been thinking about... for the band.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I see.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I see.

Entries.DialogueText: My little brother gets so excited for festivals. He's been talking about tomorrow's egg hunt all day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My little brother gets so excited for festivals. He's been talking about tomorrow's egg hunt all day.

Entries.DialogueText: Why couldn't the flower dance be today so I could get work off? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why couldn't the flower dance be today so I could get work off?

Entries.DialogueText: One time, Gus fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry him out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One time, Gus fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry him out.

Entries.DialogueText: We were all worried we'd never taste his famous spaghetti ever again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We were all worried we'd never taste his famous spaghetti ever again.

Entries.DialogueText: Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old man who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. He always makes sure no one is around to see him working.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old man who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. He always makes sure no one is around to see him working.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't have to work tomorrow! I've never been so happy. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't have to work tomorrow! I've never been so happy.

Entries.DialogueText: The Feast of the Winter Star is supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in life.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The Feast of the Winter Star is supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in life.

Entries.DialogueText: Me? I'm mostly interested in the food. Hehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Me? I'm mostly interested in the food. Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah... That's what happened!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah... That's what happened!

Entries.DialogueText: He's right... That's what happened. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's right... That's what happened.

Entries.DialogueText: She's right... That's what happened. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: She's right... That's what happened.

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah... That's what happened!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah... That's what happened!

Entries.DialogueText: What!? He's lying! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What!? He's lying!

Entries.DialogueText: What!? She's lying! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What!? She's lying!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, how's it going?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, how's it going?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm hungry.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm hungry.

Entries.DialogueText: See you later.
Entries.DisplayPattern: See you later.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you been to the desert yet?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you been to the desert yet?

Entries.DialogueText: You can find some interesting things there. Dad took me a couple times when I was younger.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can find some interesting things there. Dad took me a couple times when I was younger.

Entries.DialogueText: There's a little less pollen in the summer... my nose is really happy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's a little less pollen in the summer... my nose is really happy.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.

Entries.DialogueText: Goodbye for now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Goodbye for now.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Do you want to hang out or something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Do you want to hang out or something?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so energized during summer I hardly have to sleep!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so energized during summer I hardly have to sleep!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. Taking the day off?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. Taking the day off?

Entries.DialogueText: Sounds interesting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sounds interesting.

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a spider on my ceiling last night. They sure like the warmth.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a spider on my ceiling last night. They sure like the warmth.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope he didn't crawl into my mouth while I was asleep... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope he didn't crawl into my mouth while I was asleep...

Entries.DialogueText: Dad was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I can hear my Dad pacing down the hallway at night. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes I can hear my Dad pacing down the hallway at night.

Entries.DialogueText: ...But he won't tell us what's troubling him.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But he won't tell us what's troubling him.

Entries.DialogueText: You know... I used to live in the city and I have to admit, this place is much nicer in the summer. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know... I used to live in the city and I have to admit, this place is much nicer in the summer.

Entries.DialogueText: The city is so hot with all that concrete.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The city is so hot with all that concrete.

Entries.DialogueText: When you see hot air balloons drifting over the sea, you'll know that summer's in full swing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you see hot air balloons drifting over the sea, you'll know that summer's in full swing.

Entries.DialogueText: I like taking walks in the forest this time of year. The temperature is so comfortable.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like taking walks in the forest this time of year. The temperature is so comfortable.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Happy}
Oh, hi. Are you making friends with anyone in town?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi. Are you making friends with anyone in town?

Entries.DialogueText: Bye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bye.

Entries.DialogueText: My shoes always seem to wear out this time of year. Look, my toe's poking through! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My shoes always seem to wear out this time of year. Look, my toe's poking through!

Entries.DialogueText: That's what happens when you skateboard too much.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's what happens when you skateboard too much.

Entries.DialogueText: I ordered a new pair of shoes online. They're the same style so I know they'll fit right.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I ordered a new pair of shoes online. They're the same style so I know they'll fit right.

Entries.DialogueText: I ordered some shoes online more than a week ago! Man, they're really taking a long time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I ordered some shoes online more than a week ago! Man, they're really taking a long time.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess we must really live in the middle of nowhere. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess we must really live in the middle of nowhere.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, my feet feel great in these new shoes. They're a little crisp, but they'll break in. Especially after I run through the haunted maze this weekend. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, my feet feel great in these new shoes. They're a little crisp, but they'll break in. Especially after I run through the haunted maze this weekend.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Do you want to hang out or something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Do you want to hang out or something?

Entries.DialogueText: Just stop by whenever you want.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just stop by whenever you want.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... something smells good, like pizza.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... something smells good, like pizza.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you smell that? Maybe Mom's cooking something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you smell that? Maybe Mom's cooking something.

Entries.DialogueText: I think my Dad might be coming back next year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think my Dad might be coming back next year.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon...

Entries.DialogueText: ...But I would miss Mom's fish casserole, so I dunno... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But I would miss Mom's fish casserole, so I dunno...

Entries.DialogueText: I hate making decisions.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hate making decisions.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you ever notice all the spider webs that appear during the fall?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you ever notice all the spider webs that appear during the fall?

Entries.DialogueText: If you get up early you'll see them covered in dew... like little stars.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you get up early you'll see them covered in dew... like little stars.

Entries.DialogueText: I used to live in Zuzu City, you know. The biggest difference is the noise. It's never quiet in the city.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I used to live in Zuzu City, you know. The biggest difference is the noise. It's never quiet in the city.

Entries.DialogueText: There's way more people around you, always. And it's always bright with city lights, even at night.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's way more people around you, always. And it's always bright with city lights, even at night.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess which setting you like depends on your personality.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess which setting you like depends on your personality.

Entries.DialogueText: I think I've grown to like the country more than the city. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I've grown to like the country more than the city.

Entries.DialogueText: Although I could be biased... for a certain reason. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.

Entries.DialogueText: So, how are you doing today? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, how are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm lucky to have the biggest room in the house to myself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm lucky to have the biggest room in the house to myself.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess there's advantages to being the oldest child.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess there's advantages to being the oldest child.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm. I think I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm. I think I was meaning to do something... But I forgot.

Entries.DialogueText: This happens to me all the time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This happens to me all the time.

Entries.DialogueText: The first week of fall is already over. Man, that went by fast. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The first week of fall is already over. Man, that went by fast.

Entries.DialogueText: Whatever. I'm just happy that you came to visit me!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whatever. I'm just happy that you came to visit me!

Entries.DialogueText: So do you have anything new to tell me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So do you have anything new to tell me?

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard to have fun on Sunday... I keep thinking about having to go to work tomorrow. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard to have fun on Sunday... I keep thinking about having to go to work tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi .

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm.. I wonder if I could grow a cactus in my room?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm.. I wonder if I could grow a cactus in my room?

Entries.DialogueText: Everyone's indoors during the winter, so I can play guitar as loud as I want. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Everyone's indoors during the winter, so I can play guitar as loud as I want.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... Cold, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... Cold, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi! It's good to see you again.

Entries.DialogueText: Take it easy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Take it easy.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Do you want to hang out or something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Do you want to hang out or something?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, it's a good time of year to catch up on all the sleep I've missed. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, it's a good time of year to catch up on all the sleep I've missed.

Entries.DialogueText: I hate working at JojaMart, but how else am I going to make money in this town?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hate working at JojaMart, but how else am I going to make money in this town?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad I work at the museum now. It's way more interesting than that depressing JojaMart ever was.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad I work at the museum now. It's way more interesting than that depressing JojaMart ever was.

Entries.DialogueText: I think my Dad is coming back this spring.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think my Dad is coming back this spring.

Entries.DialogueText: It's been 3 years since I've seen him. This is going to be strange.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been 3 years since I've seen him. This is going to be strange.

Entries.DialogueText: Dad's been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad's been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it.

Entries.DialogueText: My Dad is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My Dad is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here.

Entries.DialogueText: He's coming back soon, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's coming back soon, though.

Entries.DialogueText: One thing that's nice about winter... all the mosquitos are gone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One thing that's nice about winter... all the mosquitos are gone.

Entries.DialogueText: The worst thing about the snow is getting your feet soaked. You're lucky in those thick boots.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The worst thing about the snow is getting your feet soaked. You're lucky in those thick boots.

Entries.DialogueText: I just remembered I need to change the strings on my guitar.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just remembered I need to change the strings on my guitar.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, I'm going to write a note on my wrist so I remember to do it tonight.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, I'm going to write a note on my wrist so I remember to do it tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.

Entries.DialogueText: It would be fun if we could go sledding, wouldn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It would be fun if we could go sledding, wouldn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't think there are any good hills nearby. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't think there are any good hills nearby.

Entries.DialogueText: Plus, I don't have a sled.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Plus, I don't have a sled.

Entries.DialogueText: So, how have you been doing lately?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, how have you been doing lately?

Entries.DialogueText: Try not to make a mess in the house or my Mom will flip.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Try not to make a mess in the house or my Mom will flip.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to be really happy as your husband, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to be really happy as your husband, .

Entries.DialogueText: I'm excited.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm excited.

Entries.DialogueText: I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't wait till the wedding. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't wait till the wedding.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Do you still love me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Do you still love me?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you still happy with me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you still happy with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever wonder what else is out there? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?

Entries.DialogueText: You used to be romantic... what happened? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You used to be romantic... what happened?

Entries.DialogueText: I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?

Entries.DialogueText: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?

Entries.DialogueText: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been so cold to me lately... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been so cold to me lately...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could've done better. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could've done better.

Entries.DialogueText: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess fall's finally here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess fall's finally here.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, tomorrow's the fair. I need to get my old slingshot wrist back in shape...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, tomorrow's the fair. I need to get my old slingshot wrist back in shape...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if Mom will let Vincent enter the haunted maze this year. Probably not... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if Mom will let Vincent enter the haunted maze this year. Probably not...

Entries.DialogueText: Poor kid. He's gonna have to grow up some day...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Poor kid. He's gonna have to grow up some day...

Entries.DialogueText: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder what's going on in the rest of the world? We're really secluded here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder what's going on in the rest of the world? We're really secluded here.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm gonna visit the family today, okay? I'll be home in the evening.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm gonna visit the family today, okay? I'll be home in the evening.

Entries.DialogueText: Seeing family is nice, but it's also kind of depressing in a weird way. Like... our lives are totally separate now, and everything feels more formal than it used to. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Seeing family is nice, but it's also kind of depressing in a weird way. Like... our lives are totally separate now, and everything feels more formal than it used to.

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard to believe we're finally married... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard to believe we're finally married...

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever think of that night we snuck into my room? I do, often... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever think of that night we snuck into my room? I do, often...

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I think I had a feeling we'd be together from the very beginning. There's just something special between us. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I think I had a feeling we'd be together from the very beginning. There's just something special between us.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you do something with your hair? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you do something with your hair?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, you look stunning today. Did you do something new with your hair? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, you look stunning today. Did you do something new with your hair?

Entries.DialogueText: Baby, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Baby, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.

Entries.DialogueText: I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.

Entries.DialogueText: Baby, talk to me! I'm always interested to hear about your day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Baby, talk to me! I'm always interested to hear about your day.

Entries.DialogueText: Be careful out there! I know you go into the caves sometimes... you could be eaten alive in there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be careful out there! I know you go into the caves sometimes... you could be eaten alive in there!

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a simple life, but I like it. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a simple life, but I like it.

Entries.DialogueText: Phew... I'll tell you one thing I don't miss about my old life... working at JojaMart.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Phew... I'll tell you one thing I don't miss about my old life... working at JojaMart.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I made you some instant pancakes. Enjoy. [211] {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I made you some instant pancakes. Enjoy.

Entries.DialogueText: What? I never learned to cook... mom always did that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What? I never learned to cook... mom always did that.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that I seriously love you... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that I seriously love you...

Entries.DialogueText: Do you have big plans for the day?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you have big plans for the day?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, not me... I usually decide what to do a few moments beforehand...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, not me... I usually decide what to do a few moments beforehand...

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Maybe I'll help out on the farm some other day. I feel lazy today. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Maybe I'll help out on the farm some other day. I feel lazy today.

Entries.DialogueText: You're not mad?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're not mad?

Entries.DialogueText: There's too much stuff I want to get done today... Maybe I'll just watch TV instead.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's too much stuff I want to get done today... Maybe I'll just watch TV instead.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you look tired. Let me help you relax tonight, okay? Maybe I'll give you a massage later.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you look tired. Let me help you relax tonight, okay? Maybe I'll give you a massage later.

Entries.DialogueText: My day? Oh... I can hardly remember. I didn't really do anything of note. Just relaxed and had a good time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My day? Oh... I can hardly remember. I didn't really do anything of note. Just relaxed and had a good time.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, sorry I didn't make the bed. You know I'm sloppy... that's why you like me, right? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, sorry I didn't make the bed. You know I'm sloppy... that's why you like me, right?

Entries.DialogueText: The only thing I miss about living at home is Mom's fish casserole
Entries.DisplayPattern: The only thing I miss about living at home is Mom's fish casserole

Entries.DialogueText: Ready to hit the hay? I actually made the bed for once...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ready to hit the hay? I actually made the bed for once...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if the moon is visible tonight?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if the moon is visible tonight?

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: So, did you get everything done on the farm today? If you didn't I won't be mad!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, did you get everything done on the farm today? If you didn't I won't be mad!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?

Entries.DialogueText: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...

Entries.DialogueText: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.

Entries.DialogueText: Are we doing okay on money, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are we doing okay on money, ?

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't really feel like doing anything today.

Entries.DialogueText: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess farms can be kind of dirty.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?

Entries.DialogueText: Where am I supposed to sleep...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where am I supposed to sleep...?

Entries.DialogueText: I wasn't able to sleep well last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wasn't able to sleep well last night...

Entries.DialogueText: I had to sleep on the floor last night... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had to sleep on the floor last night...

Entries.DialogueText: Did something happen to our bed...? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did something happen to our bed...?

Entries.DialogueText: I'll change %kid1's diaper... don't worry about it. You've got enough on your plate.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll change 's diaper... don't worry about it. You've got enough on your plate.

Entries.DialogueText: It's weird, but I really like being a father! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's weird, but I really like being a father!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll feed today. You can just focus on running the farm.

Entries.DialogueText: I think we should have another kid. Why stop now?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think we should have another kid. Why stop now?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I should get some off-road wheels for my skateboard. Mayor Lewis can't touch me out here. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I should get some off-road wheels for my skateboard. Mayor Lewis can't touch me out here.

Entries.DialogueText: I always keep an eye on the wide blue sky... you never know when a UFO might go by.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always keep an eye on the wide blue sky... you never know when a UFO might go by.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, ! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll try and help you with encouraging thoughts. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll try and help you with encouraging thoughts.

Entries.DialogueText: Something in the air makes me feel positive... maybe it's the faint whiff of pizza from Gus' ovens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Something in the air makes me feel positive... maybe it's the faint whiff of pizza from Gus' ovens.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... you look great today, and the specks of mud just add some extra charm. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... you look great today, and the specks of mud just add some extra charm.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, look at those puffy clouds in the sky, honey! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, look at those puffy clouds in the sky, honey!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to watch those for a while, if you don't mind.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to watch those for a while, if you don't mind.

Entries.DialogueText: *Sigh*... I'm never gonna land this trick... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sigh*... I'm never gonna land this trick...

Entries.DialogueText: Might be a good day to sit back and jam on the guitar...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Might be a good day to sit back and jam on the guitar...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you can relax too if you want.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you can relax too if you want.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think Sebastian and Abigail will ever hook up?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think Sebastian and Abigail will ever hook up?

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I found one of these rolling around in the back of a drawer. [90 88 86 535]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I found one of these rolling around in the back of a drawer.

Entries.DialogueText: I thought you might be able to use it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought you might be able to use it.

Entries.DialogueText: Aw, man. These cloudy days are kind of a drag... {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aw, man. These cloudy days are kind of a drag...

Entries.DialogueText: How'd you sleep? The sound of rain really makes me zonk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: How'd you sleep? The sound of rain really makes me zonk.

Entries.DialogueText: I might spend some time today fixing any leaks in the roof or the windows.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I might spend some time today fixing any leaks in the roof or the windows.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, how was your day? I just lay around and read comics most of the day... it was great. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, how was your day? I just lay around and read comics most of the day... it was great.

Entries.DialogueText: It was a pretty low-key day for me... colas, frozen pizza, a few hours noodling around on the guitar. I feel relaxed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was a pretty low-key day for me... colas, frozen pizza, a few hours noodling around on the guitar. I feel relaxed.

Entries.DialogueText: Earlier, I listened to our live recording from that show we played. Remember that? Man, was that sloppy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Earlier, I listened to our live recording from that show we played. Remember that? Man, was that sloppy.

Entries.DialogueText: It made me a little nervous that you were there, I didn't want to mess up and have you think I was a loser! {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It made me a little nervous that you were there, I didn't want to mess up and have you think I was a loser!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope Vincent's not too lonely now that I'm gone... I kinda felt responsible for the little guy. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope Vincent's not too lonely now that I'm gone... I kinda felt responsible for the little guy.

Entries.DialogueText: But, life's all about change... right? Kids need to learn that, eventually... Or else adulthood will destroy them. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, life's all about change... right? Kids need to learn that, eventually... Or else adulthood will destroy them.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I tossed a couple frozen pizzas into the oven. Here's yours. [206] {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I tossed a couple frozen pizzas into the oven. Here's yours.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent called. He said he misses me and also to tell you hi. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent called. He said he misses me and also to tell you hi.

Entries.DialogueText: The old guitar... I don't have as much drive to play it anymore. That's fine.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The old guitar... I don't have as much drive to play it anymore. That's fine.

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: What's on your agenda today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's on your agenda today?

Entries.DialogueText: Ub... spring... my doze... allergies. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ub... spring... my doze... allergies.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sebastian again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sebastian again.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I thought I could get out of it now that we're married.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I thought I could get out of it now that we're married.

Entries.DialogueText: Whatever. I guess it's funny in a weird way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whatever. I guess it's funny in a weird way.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* ... My doze is stubbed up... allergies.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* ... My doze is stubbed up... allergies.

Entries.DialogueText: The pollen count is a little lower in summer, so my nose is really happy. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The pollen count is a little lower in summer, so my nose is really happy.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?

Entries.DialogueText: It might be funny to put something nasty. You know, to play a prank on the governor! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It might be funny to put something nasty. You know, to play a prank on the governor!

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry...

Entries.DialogueText: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of them.

Entries.DialogueText: Summer's great, but I'm ready for the fall now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer's great, but I'm ready for the fall now.

Entries.DialogueText: Should we watch the jellyfish tomorrow night? It's always kind of fun.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Should we watch the jellyfish tomorrow night? It's always kind of fun.

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.

Entries.DialogueText: Summer always makes me want to eat more barbecue.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer always makes me want to eat more barbecue.

Entries.DialogueText: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their diapers! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their diapers! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just kidding... I didn't marry you for the money.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just kidding... I didn't marry you for the money.

Entries.DialogueText: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We have to make sure and give a lot of attention now that we have . We don't want any jealousy between them.

Entries.DialogueText: It's fun to see the babies playing with each other. I think they're going to be very close.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's fun to see the babies playing with each other. I think they're going to be very close.

Entries.DialogueText: I never thought I'd become such a family man, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I never thought I'd become such a family man, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.

Entries.DialogueText: The cold air makes my hair gel freeze. It's not very pleasant. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The cold air makes my hair gel freeze. It's not very pleasant.

Entries.DialogueText: We had a great year, {Farmer_Name}... it's kind of sad that it's over.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We had a great year, ... it's kind of sad that it's over.

Entries.DialogueText: We'll just have to make next year even better! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We'll just have to make next year even better!

Entries.DialogueText: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? It might be fun to see everyone again...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are we going to stop by the ice festival tomorrow? It might be fun to see everyone again...

Entries.DialogueText: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family man now!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family man now!

Entries.DialogueText: Rain muffles sound, so I can play my guitar louder without my mom getting mad. Hehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain muffles sound, so I can play my guitar louder without my mom getting mad. Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}. Guess what? My band is playing a show tonight, in Zuzu City!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi . Guess what? My band is playing a show tonight, in Zuzu City!

Entries.DialogueText: Meet me at the bus stop around 4:00 this afternoon to leave for the show. You better be there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Meet me at the bus stop around 4:00 this afternoon to leave for the show. You better be there!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm excited and a little nervous for the show tonight. I'm sure everything will turn out okay.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm excited and a little nervous for the show tonight. I'm sure everything will turn out okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hey {Farmer_Name}. You look like you've been working hard out there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hey . You look like you've been working hard out there!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I was just thinking... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I was just thinking...

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I really like living here with you. I mean... I love it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I really like living here with you. I mean... I love it!

Entries.DialogueText: But, I feel like I've gotten really lazy. I just bum around aimlessly every day. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, I feel like I've gotten really lazy. I just bum around aimlessly every day.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I know you don't mind! You make enough money on the farm that I don't really need to work, and I really appreciate that!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I know you don't mind! You make enough money on the farm that I don't really need to work, and I really appreciate that!

Entries.DialogueText: But I want to feel like I'm contributing to something... know what I mean?
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I want to feel like I'm contributing to something... know what I mean?

Entries.DialogueText: So... I think I'm gonna try to find some work... something to do with music.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So... I think I'm gonna try to find some work... something to do with music.

Entries.DialogueText: That's always been what I love the most! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's always been what I love the most!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, uh... besides you, of course! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, uh... besides you, of course!

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh...

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway... I'll let you know how it goes!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway... I'll let you know how it goes!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}, listen to this! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey , listen to this!

Entries.DialogueText: 'Dear Sam, we are pleased to offer you a position as 'junior composer' at Zuzu Broadcasting Group, TV division...' {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 'Dear Sam, we are pleased to offer you a position as 'junior composer' at Zuzu Broadcasting Group, TV division...'

Entries.DialogueText: Wow! Music for a TV show! How cool is that?! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow! Music for a TV show! How cool is that?!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... Hold on... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... Hold on...

Entries.DialogueText: ... It's a TV show for little kids... 'The Happy Junimo Show' {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... It's a TV show for little kids... 'The Happy Junimo Show'

Entries.DialogueText: Not exactly what I had in mind... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not exactly what I had in mind...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... Yeah, I guess that's one way to look at it. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... Yeah, I guess that's one way to look at it.

Entries.DialogueText: I mean... you're right, someone's gotta make children's music. But it's not exactly a 'dream job'... {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I mean... you're right, someone's gotta make children's music. But it's not exactly a 'dream job'...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah well... that's okay. I'll make the best of it, like I always do. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah well... that's okay. I'll make the best of it, like I always do.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'd better start 'thinking like a kid'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'd better start 'thinking like a kid'...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... That's not a bad idea. At the very least, I could play him my songs and see if he likes them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... That's not a bad idea. At the very least, I could play him my songs and see if he likes them.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for the advice, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for the advice, .

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be working on this for a few days.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be working on this for a few days.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. I'm making progress on the song... check it out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . I'm making progress on the song... check it out.

Entries.DialogueText: It's kinda bare-bones right now... but when I add in all the different instruments, it'll come together. You'll see.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kinda bare-bones right now... but when I add in all the different instruments, it'll come together. You'll see.

Entries.DialogueText: You know... I'm not too upset about this kid's show idea anymore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know... I'm not too upset about this kid's show idea anymore.

Entries.DialogueText: You gotta start somewhere, right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You gotta start somewhere, right?

Entries.DialogueText: And hey, maybe I'll be a big hit in the children's concert circuit! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And hey, maybe I'll be a big hit in the children's concert circuit!

Entries.DialogueText: I'll have the finished song ready soon. I hope they're happy with it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll have the finished song ready soon. I hope they're happy with it!

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, okay, Vince... I'm gonna put the song on right away. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, okay, Vince... I'm gonna put the song on right away.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, you gotta listen really close, so you can tell me if you like it afterwards. Okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, you gotta listen really close, so you can tell me if you like it afterwards. Okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow! I wasn't expecting such an overwhelming response! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow! I wasn't expecting such an overwhelming response!

Entries.DialogueText: That's great! This is really fun! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's great! This is really fun!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, thanks for all the support with this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, thanks for all the support with this.

Entries.DialogueText: You know... I kind of like making children's music. It's not very glamorous, but I'm making these kids really happy. That's important! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know... I kind of like making children's music. It's not very glamorous, but I'm making these kids really happy. That's important!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I wanted to give you this. It's a boombox with the song on it... So you can listen to it whenever you want.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I wanted to give you this. It's a boombox with the song on it... So you can listen to it whenever you want.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just glad to know that my music makes people happy...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just glad to know that my music makes people happy...

Entries.DialogueText: Uh... Er... I... I'm sorry, sir. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uh... Er... I... I'm sorry, sir.

Entries.DialogueText: Yes, sir. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes, sir.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Did you see that trick, though? That was rad. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Did you see that trick, though? That was rad.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi .

Entries.DialogueText: I wanted to talk to you in private...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanted to talk to you in private...

Entries.DialogueText: It's kinda cold out here though... let's sneak into my room. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kinda cold out here though... let's sneak into my room.

Entries.DialogueText: So... {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Custom:10}
I know I've been talking about nothing but the band for a while now... But I don't want you to think that's all I'm interested in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know I've been talking about nothing but the band for a while now... But I don't want you to think that's all I'm interested in.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Er... What I mean is... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Er... What I mean is...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I'm really happy that we've grown so close... Heh. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I'm really happy that we've grown so close... Heh.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... do you think of me as... just a friend? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... do you think of me as... just a friend?

Entries.DialogueText: Quick! Hide in the bed! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Quick! Hide in the bed!

Entries.DialogueText: No Mom! I was just... doing push-ups! I wanna beat Dad at arm-wrestling some day! ...heh. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: No Mom! I was just... doing push-ups! I wanna beat Dad at arm-wrestling some day! ...heh.

Entries.DialogueText: Goodnight, Mom. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Goodnight, Mom.

Entries.DialogueText: Whew... That was close. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whew... That was close.

Entries.DialogueText: ...{Farmer_Name}?
Get out of the bed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Get out of the bed.

Entries.DialogueText: Stay put.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stay put.

Entries.DialogueText: Earlier, I was trying to say... that I really like you, {Farmer_Name}. I think we could really have something special together... Know what I mean?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Earlier, I was trying to say... that I really like you, . I think we could really have something special together... Know what I mean?

Entries.DialogueText: Alright, I said it. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright, I said it.

Entries.DialogueText: Move closer to Sam.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Move closer to Sam.

Entries.DialogueText: Head for the window.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Head for the window.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to be thinking about this night for a long time...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to be thinking about this night for a long time...

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Love}
...Yes, ma'am. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Yes, ma'am.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Yes, ma'am. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Yes, ma'am.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi {Farmer_Name}! Sebastian and I were just having a little 'jam session'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi ! Sebastian and I were just having a little 'jam session'.

Entries.DialogueText: We're trying to start a band, but we still don't know what kind of music to make. There's too many possibilities.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're trying to start a band, but we still don't know what kind of music to make. There's too many possibilities.

Entries.DialogueText: Say, {Farmer_Name}... what kind of music do you like?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Say, ... what kind of music do you like?

Entries.DialogueText: Cheerful pop music.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cheerful pop music.

Entries.DialogueText: Experimental noise rock.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Experimental noise rock.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi-Energy dance music.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi-Energy dance music.

Entries.DialogueText: Honky-tonky country music.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Honky-tonky country music.

Entries.DialogueText: What do you say, Sebastian? Should we do this?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you say, Sebastian? Should we do this?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for the help, {Farmer_Name}. With my guitar skills, and Sebastian's wizardry on the synthesizer, we're gonna be a screaming success. I'm convinced of it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for the help, . With my guitar skills, and Sebastian's wizardry on the synthesizer, we're gonna be a screaming success. I'm convinced of it!

Entries.DialogueText: Now I just need to find someone to play drums... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now I just need to find someone to play drums...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi {Farmer_Name}. I was just about to have a snack.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hi . I was just about to have a snack.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, let me get something for you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, let me get something for you.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no... What a mess. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no... What a mess.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Tell her, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Tell her, .

Entries.DialogueText: Sam dropped the snack as he was handing it to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam dropped the snack as he was handing it to me.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam handed me the snack and then I dropped it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam handed me the snack and then I dropped it.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam dropped it on purpose. He thought it would be funny.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam dropped it on purpose. He thought it would be funny.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry about this, mom. I'll clean it up. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry about this, mom. I'll clean it up.

Entries.DialogueText: I always knew there was something special between us... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always knew there was something special between us...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to be thinking about this night for a long time... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to be thinking about this night for a long time...

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Love}
I see... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I see...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry... I had the wrong idea. I'll see you around. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry... I had the wrong idea. I'll see you around.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
Hey!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey!

Entries.DialogueText: Not so fast!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not so fast!

Entries.DialogueText: Never thought you'd find all your 'boyfriends' in one room, huh {Farmer_Name}? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Never thought you'd find all your 'boyfriends' in one room, huh ?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, we're not going to put up with your abuse any longer! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, we're not going to put up with your abuse any longer!

Entries.DialogueText: We all know the truth, now! And we're not going to tolerate this! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We all know the truth, now! And we're not going to tolerate this!

Entries.DialogueText: ...so we've come to a decision... isn't that right, fellas? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...so we've come to a decision... isn't that right, fellas?

Entries.DialogueText: We're all giving you the cold shoulder! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're all giving you the cold shoulder!

Entries.DialogueText: Liar!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Liar!

Entries.DialogueText: ...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?

Entries.DialogueText: We're all giving you the cold shoulder! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're all giving you the cold shoulder!

Entries.DialogueText: ...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I think we've come to a decision... isn't that right, boys?

Entries.DialogueText: We're all giving you the cold shoulder! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're all giving you the cold shoulder!

Entries.DialogueText: Hello {Farmer_Name}. Nice day, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello . Nice day, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just keeping an eye on my little brother. It's good for him to get some fresh air on a day like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just keeping an eye on my little brother. It's good for him to get some fresh air on a day like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Our Dad used to take us to the beach on sunny days like this. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Our Dad used to take us to the beach on sunny days like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Of course, Vince. Dad's going to come back as soon as he possibly can. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Of course, Vince. Dad's going to come back as soon as he possibly can.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't believe everything you hear! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't believe everything you hear!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't you remember how strong Dad is? He'd never let a pathetic Gotoro grunt get him like that! Don't you worry! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't you remember how strong Dad is? He'd never let a pathetic Gotoro grunt get him like that! Don't you worry!

Entries.DialogueText: And always remember that Mom and I are here to play with you if you ever feel lonely.
Entries.DisplayPattern: And always remember that Mom and I are here to play with you if you ever feel lonely.

Entries.DialogueText: To be honest, I have no idea if my old man will come back... We've all read the reports. Our soldiers are falling by the thousands. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: To be honest, I have no idea if my old man will come back... We've all read the reports. Our soldiers are falling by the thousands.

Entries.DialogueText: But what am I going to say to Vincent? {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But what am I going to say to Vincent?

Entries.DialogueText: It's best to be honest with kids.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's best to be honest with kids.

Entries.DialogueText: You did the right thing. Kids should have hope.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You did the right thing. Kids should have hope.

Entries.DialogueText: You think so? {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You think so?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe you're right... The world is a cruel place, but kids have to learn that one way or another. {Portrait:Sad}~Yeah... kids should play and have fun while they still have the chance.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe you're right... The world is a cruel place, but kids have to learn that one way or another.~Yeah... kids should play and have fun while they still have the chance.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey did I tell you the band's starting to come together?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey did I tell you the band's starting to come together?

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah! It turns out Abigail's a pretty good drummer. And Sebastian seemed to really want her in the band... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah! It turns out Abigail's a pretty good drummer. And Sebastian seemed to really want her in the band...

Entries.DialogueText: Cool... {Farmer_Name}, are you ready to choose your character?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cool... , are you ready to choose your character?

Entries.DialogueText: Choose your character:
Entries.DisplayPattern: Choose your character:

Entries.DialogueText: Warrior. I like a direct approach.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Warrior. I like a direct approach.

Entries.DialogueText: Healer. I prefer to help others.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Healer. I prefer to help others.

Entries.DialogueText: Wizard. A sharp mind is the most powerful blade of all.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wizard. A sharp mind is the most powerful blade of all.

Entries.DialogueText: Cool. Warrior's my favorite anyway.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cool. Warrior's my favorite anyway.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I'm stuck with the healer. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I'm stuck with the healer.

Entries.DialogueText: Cool. Warrior's my favorite anyway.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cool. Warrior's my favorite anyway.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
Sebastian casts 'Pure Bolt'... A beam of white light hits Xarth square in the face. The Dreadlord shrieks and crumbles into dust.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sebastian casts 'Pure Bolt'... A beam of white light hits Xarth square in the face. The Dreadlord shrieks and crumbles into dust.

Entries.DialogueText: You pick up the Solarion Staff and hold it high. Order has been restored to the world.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You pick up the Solarion Staff and hold it high. Order has been restored to the world.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, .

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}. Thanks for coming.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi . Thanks for coming.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, our gear's loaded already... Looks like everything's set.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, our gear's loaded already... Looks like everything's set.

Entries.DialogueText: Alright, everyone... let's get in the bus! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright, everyone... let's get in the bus!

Entries.DialogueText: *gulp*... I'm starting to get really nervous. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gulp*... I'm starting to get really nervous.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, here we are... wish me luck! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, here we are... wish me luck!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. The show was a great success! Thanks again, .
