Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}. Having a good time?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey . Having a good time?

Entries.DialogueText: The slingshot tent is pretty fun, and if you get good at it you can really rack up the star tokens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The slingshot tent is pretty fun, and if you get good at it you can really rack up the star tokens.

Entries.DialogueText: Sebastian's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sebastian's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh... I gambled and lost it all to the spinning wheel... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh... I gambled and lost it all to the spinning wheel...

Entries.DialogueText: I should've went with green. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I should've went with green.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, are you enjoying the festival? I'll be rooting for our grange display! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, are you enjoying the festival? I'll be rooting for our grange display!

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... If you're going to bet your tokens on the wheel... bet on green! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... If you're going to bet your tokens on the wheel... bet on green!

Entries.DialogueText: That's odd... It's just a dead end up ahead.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's odd... It's just a dead end up ahead.

Entries.DialogueText: I could've sworn there was someone ahead of me when I went through the maze, though. Where'd they go?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I could've sworn there was someone ahead of me when I went through the maze, though. Where'd they go?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I was wondering when you'd show up! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I was wondering when you'd show up!

Entries.DialogueText: Am I Sam? Heh, heh, heh... {Portrait:Custom:11}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Am I Sam? Heh, heh, heh...

Entries.DialogueText: My little brother and I made it pretty far in here but we got stuck.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My little brother and I made it pretty far in here but we got stuck.

Entries.DialogueText: You go on ahead... find that treasure for us!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You go on ahead... find that treasure for us!

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... ub... my doze... allergies... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... ub... my doze... allergies...

Entries.DialogueText: The gang's just the same as always. Are you having a good time?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The gang's just the same as always. Are you having a good time?

Entries.DialogueText: You know what? I admit it... I really like flowers!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know what? I admit it... I really like flowers!

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* I'd enjoy this get-together more if it wasn't for my allergies. I'll just have to suck it up! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* I'd enjoy this get-together more if it wasn't for my allergies. I'll just have to suck it up!

Entries.DialogueText: Whoa, you look really great today. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whoa, you look really great today.

Entries.DialogueText: Governor? Who cares...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Governor? Who cares...

Entries.DialogueText: Why should I care about some random old guy?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why should I care about some random old guy?

Entries.DialogueText: I guess it wouldn't be very nice to put something nasty in the soup...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess it wouldn't be very nice to put something nasty in the soup...

Entries.DialogueText: Next year, I gotta remember to bring my electric guitar... Imagine a solo at this part of the song! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Next year, I gotta remember to bring my electric guitar... Imagine a solo at this part of the song!

Entries.DialogueText: That soup is smelling zesty...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That soup is smelling zesty...

Entries.DialogueText: Did you add something good? I'm getting hungry! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you add something good? I'm getting hungry!

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if they're poisonous?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if they're poisonous?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I shouldn't push Sebastian in the water after all... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I shouldn't push Sebastian in the water after all...

Entries.DialogueText: Summer is drawing to a close. I'm gonna miss the long days!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer is drawing to a close. I'm gonna miss the long days!

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... you look great tonight! {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... you look great tonight!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm thankful for my guitar and my skateboard. Oh, and my family I guess.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm thankful for my guitar and my skateboard. Oh, and my family I guess.

Entries.DialogueText: *yawn*... I'm here for the gifts and the cookies. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *yawn*... I'm here for the gifts and the cookies.

Entries.DialogueText: Who gifts someone a Joja basket?... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Who gifts someone a Joja basket?...

Entries.DialogueText: It's kinda fun watching everyone unwrap their presents... seeing their reactions. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kinda fun watching everyone unwrap their presents... seeing their reactions.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh yeah, I got you something. I'll uhh... show you when we get back to the farmhouse! {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh yeah, I got you something. I'll uhh... show you when we get back to the farmhouse!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Are you gonna enter the ice fishing competition?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Are you gonna enter the ice fishing competition?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, not me. I don't know how to fish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, not me. I don't know how to fish.

Entries.DialogueText: Aren't you cold? Are you sure you don't want my jacket?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aren't you cold? Are you sure you don't want my jacket?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, why are you laughing? He's not even done yet!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, why are you laughing? He's not even done yet!

Entries.DialogueText: You just wait... once we're finished, he'll be one fine snowman.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You just wait... once we're finished, he'll be one fine snowman.

Entries.DialogueText: You should teach me how to use a fishing rod sometime. I think I'd be good at it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You should teach me how to use a fishing rod sometime. I think I'd be good at it.

Entries.DialogueText: Aw, yea! This is my absolute favorite!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aw, yea! This is my absolute favorite!

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks! I really like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks! I really like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm.. this is... interesting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm.. this is... interesting.

Entries.DialogueText: You really don't get it, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You really don't get it, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: You got that for me? Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You got that for me? Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, don't look in there! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, don't look in there!

Entries.DialogueText: I feel like I've changed a lot from when we first met... you know?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel like I've changed a lot from when we first met... you know?

Entries.DialogueText: ...you might call it 'maturity'... hehe. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...you might call it 'maturity'... hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: But I'm at a place, now, where I'm actually really excited about our future together... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I'm at a place, now, where I'm actually really excited about our future together...

Entries.DialogueText: Even if that means just doing normal stuff, like... uh... buying groceries and changing diapers... hah... {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even if that means just doing normal stuff, like... uh... buying groceries and changing diapers... hah...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh man, I'm so excited for this! I heard it has a great soundtrack.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh man, I'm so excited for this! I heard it has a great soundtrack.

Entries.DialogueText: This movie's hilarious! How do they come up with this stuff? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This movie's hilarious! How do they come up with this stuff?

Entries.DialogueText: Sam can't contain his laughter!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam can't contain his laughter!

Entries.DialogueText: *psst*... Don't tell anyone, but I wear the same type of socks as Wumbus.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *psst*... Don't tell anyone, but I wear the same type of socks as Wumbus.

Entries.DialogueText: So you like scary movies, huh? I'm a little surprised!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So you like scary movies, huh? I'm a little surprised!

Entries.DialogueText: That was pretty good! I'm usually not scared by movies, but that one got to me a little... I don't think I'll take Vincent to see this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was pretty good! I'm usually not scared by movies, but that one got to me a little... I don't think I'll take Vincent to see this.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, thanks for inviting me, {Farmer_Name}... It's really great that we have a movie theater in town now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, thanks for inviting me, ... It's really great that we have a movie theater in town now.

Entries.DialogueText: That wasn't bad! I might have to take Vincent to see this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That wasn't bad! I might have to take Vincent to see this.

Entries.DialogueText: It's an old movie with lots of talking, right? Hmm... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's an old movie with lots of talking, right? Hmm...

Entries.DialogueText: Huh? Oh! Yeah... The movie's... interesting... {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Huh? Oh! Yeah... The movie's... interesting...

Entries.DialogueText: Sam is playing his handheld video game system.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam is playing his handheld video game system.

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah... Uh... That one character was interesting... And, um... heh... {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah... Uh... That one character was interesting... And, um... heh...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, don't forget to pick up our free cactus before the festival ends.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, don't forget to pick up our free cactus before the festival ends.

Entries.DialogueText: Whatever it looks like, it's gonna be perfect in our house! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whatever it looks like, it's gonna be perfect in our house!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Check out my cactus. I'm trying to think of a name for him.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Check out my cactus. I'm trying to think of a name for him.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... maybe '%name'?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... maybe ''?

Entries.DialogueText: Want my old broken skateboard? I guess you could use it for decoration or something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Want my old broken skateboard? I guess you could use it for decoration or something.
